titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exempt certain agricultural workers from the withholding of income taxes from wages.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E447)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/24/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from income tax withholding the wages of agricultural workers for services that are not described as exempt from minimum wage and maximum hour provisions of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938.
